item.description:
Hello all

The pool is officially open! and I'm  hosting a party and would love if some of you come. bring your favorite game and a snacky food or a dessert.

Parking logistics - Please park on the street or the CVS parking lot. Please don't park in the front spots or the side of the house.

I look forward to hosting  you all

Please bring your $1.00 our wonderful organizer.,

group.name: The CardBoard Players Club of Connecticut

item.name: pool party and games
